mapper.select: select id, param_name paramName, param_code paramCode, param_value paramValue from cc_params order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into cc_agent_online( id, extnum, opnum, group_id, session_id, agent_status, last_hangup_time, login_time, client_ip, busy_lock_time, skill_level ) value ( #{user.id}, #{user.extnum}, #{user.opnum}, #{user.groupId}, #{user.sessionId}, #{user.agentStatus.index}, 0, #{user.loginTime}, #{user.clientIp}, 0, #{user.skillLevel} )
mapper.delete:
delete from cc_agent_online where opnum in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT power_id powerId , ext_num extNum, group_id groupId from cc_ext_power where ext_num=#{extNum}
SELECT id, extnum, opnum, group_id, session_id, agent_status, last_hangup_time, login_time, client_ip, busy_lock_time, skill_level FROM cc_agent_online where group_id > 0
SELECT group_id groupId, biz_group_name bizGroupName FROM cc_biz_group

select id, extnum, opnum, group_id groupId, session_id sessionId, agent_status agentStatus, last_hangup_time lastHangupTime, login_time loginTime, client_ip clientIp, skill_level skillLevel, state_change_time stateChangeTime from cc_agent_online where group_id=#{groupId} and agent_status in (3, 4) order by lastHangupTime asc

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) as connected from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and connected_time > 0 and call_end_time>0 ) / (SELECT COUNT(*) as total from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and callout_time>0 and call_end_time>0 ) as connected_rate

SELECT (select count(*) from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and connected_time>0 and callstatus=51) / (select count(*) from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and connected_time>0 and call_end_time>0 ) as dropRate
select avg(connected_time - callout_time)/1000 from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and connected_time>0
select avg(queue_time - connected_time)/1000 from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and queue_time>0 and connected_time>0
select avg(call_end_time - answered_time)/1000 from batchcall_phone where batch_id=#{batchId} and call_end_time>0 and answered_time>0

select id, extnum, opnum, group_id groupId, session_id sessionId, agent_status agentStatus, last_hangup_time lastHangupTime, login_time loginTime, client_ip clientIp, skill_level skillLevel from cc_agent_online where busy_lock_time > 0 and busy_lock_time <= #{expiredTimeMills}
